alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 9:24PM EDT until April 15 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Fulton County in western Kentucky... Southwestern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... New Madrid County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Stoddard County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Malden, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Portageville, East Prairie, New Madrid, Lilbourn, Hunter-Dawson State Historic Site, Big Oak Tree State Park, Malden, Gideon, Parma, Matthews, Marston, Howardville, Risco, Farrenburg, Tallapoosa, Catron, North Lilbourn and Boundurant. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 33 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Missouri.
